title: Peaky Blinders fifth series premiere held in Birmingham
content: This video can not be playedThe world premiere for the fifth series of Peaky Blinders has been held in Birmingham ahead of its return to BBC One later this year.The latest instalment is set against the turmoil of the 1929 financial crash, with stars Cillian Murphy, Helen McCrory and Paul Anderson returning.Fans can catch up with every series so far on the BBC iPlayer <https://www.bbc.co.uk/iplayer/episodes/b045fz8r/peaky-blinders>.
